comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC --- the title on this photo is incorrect. Bain identifies the man as "W. Travers Ewell," not "w/" (which means "with").

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: New York Times story, January 4, 1914, takes note of upcoming costume parties among NYC socialites: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=980CE7D91F3BE6... Other Bain/LOC photos of guests at a costume party in New York City (the lacy backdrop in all seven photos is the same): [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4818630002/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4818007979/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4818008811/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4818007483/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4818008353/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4818630464/in/photostream/]
